TitlePage.Abstract: The &Digraphs; package is a &GAP; package containing methods for graphs, digraphs, and multidigraphs.
TitlePage.Acknowledgements:
We would like to thank Christopher Jefferson for his help in including &bliss; in &Digraphs;.
This package's methods for computing digraph homomorphisms are based on work by Max Neunhöffer, and independently Artur Schäfer.
